Submodules¶

  • data. The data subpackage includes functions for data munging, for example for formatting data usefully for import in pandas or to R.

  • im_data. The im_data subpackage includes images and data for testing purposes.

    im_data¶

    This submodule contains some images that we will use for demo and test purposes.

    Much of the code in here was adapted from skimage.data.__init__.py

    Tiger image Copyright flickr user Phalinn Ooi, released under a CC by 2.0 license. This image can be freely shared and adapted. License: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/legalcode

    members:

  • image. The image subpackage includes functions for filtering images and creating filtered noise stimuli, and otherwise interacting with images.

    Image submodule¶

    This submodule contains functions for working with images and creating stimuli for psychophysical experiments.

    members:

  • misc. This is a miscellaneous subpackage for things like ramp functions, e.g. creating 1D Gaussian or cosine windows for ramping stimuli on and off.

    Misc submodule¶

    This submodule contains miscellaneous functions.

    members:
